short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Make your computer run smoothly by suspending the tabs you aren't using
short.de: Lass deinen Computer geschmeidiger laufen, in dem du Tabs aussetzen lässt, die du nicht benutzt
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Faça o seu computador funcionar sem problemas suspendendo as guias que você não está usando
short.ru: Заставь свой браузер работать быстрее, приостанавливая неактивные вкладки
short.tr: Kullanmadığınız sekmeleri askıya alarak bilgisayarınızın sorunsuz çalışmasını sağlayın
short.zh_CN: 冻结暂时用不到的标签页，以便释放系统资源。
short.zh_TW: 凍結暫時用不到的分頁，達到系統資源釋放。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
The Great Suspender - Without Analytics Tracking

Codebase: https://github.com/aciidic/thegreatsuspender-notrack

I take no credit for this code, I'm simply putting it on the web store because I have trouble trusting all the other Great Suspender extensions and this one comes directly from the latest (7.1.12 notrack) release by aciidic.

The Great Suspender - Without Analytics Tracking

PLEASE NOTE: If you are switching to this extension from a different version of TheGreatSuspender, first export your tabs from the plugin settings window then, after updating, re-import your suspended tabs. Alternatively unsuspend (or bookmark) your existing suspended tabs before upgrading - you can find "unsuspend all tabs" by clicking on the extension icon in the top right corner of Chrome

Import/Export Instructions: https://i.imgur.com/jgr0qEd.png

This is a modified version of "The Great Suspender" to remove analytics tracking and rogue .js files from anonymous developer who is now in control of the GitHub source & web store versions.
